description: Comfortable, hardwearing outdoor trousers with pre-shaped tapered legs. The main material is durable and pliant G-1000 Eco Stretch and four-way stretch panels provide freedom of movement. The stretch panels, together with a slightly higher waist with elastic at the sides, give a great fit on many body types. Classic, simple design with discreet leg pockets make for a new outdoor favourite that is at home both in nature and for everyday life in town.
name: Stina Trousers, Short - Womens
